metadata.description: Stream Analytics Job Name, can contain alphanumeric characters and hypen and must be 3-63 characters long

properties.query:
WITH AlertData AS (  
-- Web Simulator Devices
  SELECT 

                        Stream.EventToken as ID,
    Stream.DeviceID,
    Stream.Temperature AS
                        reading,
    Stream.EventEnqueuedUtcTime AS [time]
    
 from IoTStream
                        Stream

 WHERE
    (Stream.EventToken IS NOT NULL) and (Stream.Temperature IS
                        NOT NULL)

UNION

-- JB's MX Chip with IoT Central Firmware
                        Update
SELECT
     GetMetadataPropertyValue(Stream, 'EventId') AS ID,
	
                        IoTHub.ConnectionDeviceId as DeviceID,
     ((Stream.temp*1.8)+32) as reading,

                        Stream.EventEnqueuedUtcTime AS [time]
     
FROM IoTStream
                        Stream

WHERE
	 (Stream.temp IS NOT NULL)

UNION

-- MX
                        Chip
SELECT
    Stream.messageId AS ID,
    Stream.DeviceID,

                        Stream.Temperature AS reading,
    Stream.EventEnqueuedUtcTime AS [time]

FROM
                        IoTStream Stream

WHERE
     (Stream.messageId IS NOT NULL) and
                        (Stream.Temperature IS NOT NULL)

UNION

-- Particle Device
SELECT

                        Stream.published_at as ID,
	 Stream.device_id AS DeviceID,
	 CAST(Stream.data as
                        float) AS reading,
	 Stream.EventEnqueuedUtcTime AS [time]

FROM IoTStream
                        Stream
WHERE
     CAST(Stream.data as float) > 0 and
                        Stream.Event='temperature'
),

AmlStep AS (  
  SELECT 
	ID,
                        
	DeviceID,
	reading, 
	time, 
	aml(ID, DeviceID, reading, time) as
                        result
  from AlertData

)

SELECT 
    result.ID,

                        result.DeviceID,
    'Temperature' AS ReadingType,

                        result.reading,
	CAST(result.time AS datetime) as time,

                        result.[abn]

--INTO testoutput
INTO AlertsQueue
FROM AmlStep 
WHERE
                        CAST(result.[abn] AS bigint)=1
AND (LAG(result.DeviceID) OVER (PARTITION BY
                        result.DeviceID, result.reading LIMIT DURATION(minute, 1)) IS NULL)
